definition: to expel/to urge on/to drive/to run quickly
scattered/loose/to come loose/to fall apart/leisurely/powdered medicine
to scatter/to break up (a meeting etc)/to disperse/to disseminate/to dispel/(coll.) to sack

sentences.english: Affects a maximum of 5 friendly targets and 5 enemy targets.
sentences.chinese: 最多驱散数量为5名友方和5名敌人。

sentences.english: On Tuesday, he said he had " exorcized the demons."
sentences.chinese: 周二，他说他已经驱散了心魔。

sentences.english: The looting appeared to be dissipating as police vans were stationed at damage sites.
sentences.chinese: 抢劫行动看起来被驻扎在受损地点的警车驱散。

sentences.english: And light disperses the darkness of the dungeon.
Stop congestion and bleeding. Promoting the circulation of blood.
sentences.chinese: 驱散淤血，止住疼痛，促进血液循环。

sentences.english: The policeman dispelled the crowd lest they should brew trouble.
sentences.chinese: 警察驱散人群，因恐他们酿祸。

sentences.english: The police fired into the air in an attempt to disperse the crowd.
sentences.chinese: 警察朝天开枪，企图驱散人群。

sentences.english: Scattershot has been moved from the Marksmanship Tree to Tier 3 of the Survival Tree.
sentences.chinese: 驱散射击现在从射击系移动到生存系第3层。

sentences.english: Scattering the Chinese provokers with armoured vehicles.
sentences.chinese: 用装甲车驱散中国的挑衅者。

sentences.english: As a bonfire dispels chilliness, so our solidarity drives away the enemy.
sentences.chinese: 篝火驱散寒冷，我们的团结可以驱散敌人。

sentences.english: As a bonfire dispels chilliness, so our solidarity drives away the enemy.
sentences.chinese: 篝火驱散寒冷，我们的团结可以驱散敌人。

sentences.english: When a king sits on his throne to judge, he winnows out all evil with his eyes.
sentences.chinese: 王坐在审判的位上，以眼目驱散诸恶。

sentences.english: Her coming charmed away all his sorrow.
sentences.chinese: 她的到来驱散了他的一切悲痛。

sentences.english: It is through the dissipation of density that one ultimately ascends upwards in vibration.
sentences.chinese: 就是通过驱散致密度，一个人最终可在振动中提升。

sentences.english: Tear gas and bullets were used to disperse the crowd but emotions remained high.
sentences.chinese: 群众被催泪瓦斯和子弹驱散，但是情绪依然高张。

definition: to drive (vehicle)/to drive out/to chase away/to herd (people towards a gate)
to pervade/to fill the air/diffuse/everywhere present/about to inundate (water)/permeated by (smoke)/filled with (dust)/to saturate (the air with fog, smoke etc)
variant of 彌漫|弥漫[mi2 man4]
to cover/to hide from view/to obstruct or block/defilade (military)
(literary) to eliminate/to put an end to
to dissipate everywhere (of light, sound, gas etc)
